mapper.update: update c_goodstype set goodstypeid=goodstypeid ,goodstypecode=#{goodstypecode} ,goodstypename=#{goodstypename} ,sequno=#{sequno} where goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid}

update c_goodstype set goodstypeid=goodstypeid ,goodstypecode=#{goodstypecode} ,goodstypename=#{goodstypename} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,sequno=#{sequno} where 1=1 and goodstypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and goodstypeid =#{Where_Id} and goodstypeid=#{Where_goodstypeid} and goodstypecode=#{Where_goodstypecode} and goodstypename=#{Where_goodstypename} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and sequno=#{Where_sequno}
mapper.select: select t.goodstypeid "goodstypeid", t.goodstypecode "goodstypecode", t.goodstypename "goodstypename", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.sequno "sequno" from c_goodstype t where goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid}

select t.goodstypeid "goodstypeid", t.goodstypecode "goodstypecode", t.goodstypename "goodstypename", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.sequno "sequno" from c_goodstype t where 1=1 and t.goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} and t.goodstypecode=#{goodstypecode} and t.goodstypename=#{goodstypename} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.sequno=#{sequno}

select t.goodstypeid "goodstypeid", t.goodstypecode "goodstypecode", t.goodstypename "goodstypename", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.sequno "sequno" from c_goodstype t where 1=1 and t.goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} and t.goodstypecode=#{goodstypecode} and t.goodstypename=#{goodstypename} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.sequno=#{sequno}
mapper.delete: delete from c_goodstype where 1=1 and goodstypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and goodstypeid =#{Where_Id} and goodstypeid=#{Where_goodstypeid} and goodstypecode=#{Where_goodstypecode} and goodstypename=#{Where_goodstypename} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and sequno=#{Where_sequno}
mapper.select: select t.goodstypeid "goodstypeid", t.goodstypecode "goodstypecode", t.goodstypename "goodstypename", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.sequno "sequno" from c_goodstype t where 1=1 and t.goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} and t.goodstypecode=#{goodstypecode} and t.goodstypename=#{goodstypename} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.sequno=#{sequno}

select count(*) from c_goodstype t where 1=1 and t.goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} and t.goodstypeid!=#{NoId} and t.goodstypecode=#{goodstypecode} and t.goodstypename=#{goodstypename} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.sequno=#{sequno}
select count(*) from c_goodstype WHERE 1=1 and goodstypename=#{goodstypename} and goodstypeid!=#{goodstypeid}
